Series IV: Officers and Staff-Administrative Files
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records
McEnroe served as Executive Director of DC 1707 from 1984 to 1994. Files in this subseries pertain to organizing, conferences, and administrative activities.
